Movement module

MovementControl.py This module contains the Movement class, which stores the rules for the Movement of citizens.

class Movement.Movement(travel_from: int, travel_to: int, ts: int)

Bases: object

Object for the exchange of citizens between nhoods and subareas.

Parameters

travel_from: int travel_to: int ts: int

Attributes

choose_mode(start_caps, end_caps)

Choose a starting travel mode. Remove modes with capacity zero.

find_route(start, end, graph_index)
get_capacities(grid, ts)

Get capacity for given mode from capacity file

get_capacity(mode, grid, ts)

Get capacity for given mode from capacity file

get_mode_users(current_grid, subarea)

Return numbers of people using given mode (in given travel subarea).

grids_in_ts(start, end, leg_times_cumsum)
